enemy.name: Ganzard
enemy.description: Straight from the world of StickQuest comes the fabled Ganzard. It's a tough opponent because stick monsters possess great durability when facing 3 dimensional enemies. Use the Stick Blade to beat the Ganzard off with a... stick?

ATTACK.Notes: Does 0 damage. Element X is assumed; it could also be Fire

OTHER.Trivia: By the time you get the Stick Blade this monster no longer appears.
